title: constant request for me to update thunderbird
content: I get constant requests for me to update thunderbird. I don't want to update thunderbird. I worked to hard to retrieve the old thunderbird. The new version added features I didn't want and took away features I wanted. Please stop asking!
creator: ErictheGreen

title: asking for help with settings for TB
content:
Hi Everyone, I have been reading the posts for some time since the problems with the new TB.

TB is still crashing (white screen of death) once or twice a day. Not complaining, just reporting.

Actually the biggest headache for me are some of the features that worked well prior to the new releases but are broken now.

I will only ask for help with one of them that is the biggest slow-down and bother for me.

I have TB set up to check accounts for new mail every 10 minutes. It gives an audio alert. Nice.

But I had TB also set up to highlight in a red color, the account that actually has the waiting message. I set this up many years ago.

That feature stopped working.

I have many email accounts, so when I hear the mail-waiting audio alert, I have to go to each one individually, Right Click and select Get Messages to see if it is that particular account that has message waiting to be retrieved from the email server.

Is this feature broken forever? Anyway to fix it in the recent releases?

Yes I know about the Get all messages possibility but that is not workable for me right now and it would be too much typing to explain it. haha.

Thanks everyone, jenny_abc
creator: jenny_abc

title: Calendar showing too many weeks
content:
I'm not sure exactly when it happened, but pretty recently, my calendar started showing 6 weeks (in 6 rows) instead of less (I think it was 4).

How do I show less weeks at once (so more of each day's pane is bigger and shows more of itself), like it used to be?

I have Thunderbird for Mac v 115.6.0

Thanks, Ted
creator: ted939

title: Archive and Archives in my folder list -- and I used neither but cannot delete them
content: I am an experienced user and now have T-bird 115.6.0 (64 bit). I have two folders in my main email (IMAP) called 'archive' and 'archives' and cannot delete or move either of them. I have archiving set up use local folders which works perfectly well. But despite the fact that neither of these folders is in anyway operational they are locked to my main email. And why do I need two? An image of the folder list is attached. I did ask this same question some time ago and got no replies, but perhaps by now someone has some sort of explanation/fix. Thanks
creator: tommyzulu

title: Thunderbird profile stopped downloading e-mails from server for several months but I can't find the solution
content: I've been using Thunderbird for more than 15 years. Last year, it suddenly stopped downloading e-mails with a message about sending password information to the server, but then does nothing. I tried various privacy and server settings but nothing worked. However, Thunderbird works fine on another laptop. Now I've migrated to a new PC, was able to copy the profile over to the new PC but the problem persists. At the same time, a different profile on the new PC works fine. I read something online about a popstate file that might be causing the server to not respond, but even deleting that did nothing. Another thought I've had is to move all the old email to the new profile, but everything I've read online talks about moving the entire profile which I have done but the problem remains the same. Old profile has all the old e-mails but doesn't get any new ones, and the new profile downloads the new incoming e-mails but of course doesn't have the old e-mails.
creator: yjh9152

title: After todays update Thunderbird stopped sending or receiveing
content:
After todays update everything on Thunderbird stopped working!! cant send, cant receive always gives failed to connect to server error message.... I contacted my server they said everything is fine on there end!

I can access with webmail login but thats not acceptable or convenient!

please HELP!!
creator: ramaddiaz1

title: email body zoom option
content:
Hello Thunderbird. Long time user here.

There are many here and there posts about size increase for received email body. Nowadays many emails are in HTML style, especially those from subscriptions, so playing with font sizes does not always work.

I played with settings font and colors but it works partially. Plain text emails yes it is bigger but also bigger for everybody, subscription emails - no, still small to look at high res screen.

Anyways html based emails I need to zoom via CTRL+MouseScrollUp/Down on my Macbook.

Can you please add this as a menu under read view to make it default like in Google Chrome for example 125% or other?

Thunderbird 115.6.0 (64-bit), Sonoma 14.2
creator: Dead0k

title: Thunderbird does not use saved passwords
content:
Thunderbird version: 115.6.0 (64-Bit)

Hello, for several monthes I am having problems with the password manager on my pc and my laptop. I can change passwords in the password manager and they will be displayed correctly after every relaunch. But every time I launch Thunderbird I will get pop ups requesting the passwords again. If I enter the exact same password I copied from the password manager it will load emails. But to later open an email I will have to enter the password again. This is not the case for all of my emailadresses. Just about 4 out of 8.

I tried to follow this solution, but don't have the file that was supposed to be deleted: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1385134

I reached a point where it is no longer reliable to use Thunderbird for work. Thanks for any suggestions!
creator: kontakt379

title: I can'see my most recent e mails . I can see them on my phone using Bluemail
content: I there something I have done on my Browser The messages are in place on my Dreamhost account and on Blue mail.
creator: geoff58

title: Update Security Settings for Telstra Email account
content:
Received email from Telstra "From 30 January 2024, Telstra will stop allowing any emails to be sent from unauthenticated email addresses. Put simply, emails won’t be sent if your security settings aren’t configured to validate your username and password before the email is sent. From our records you are currently sending unauthenticated emails from........." "What’s next? To continue to send email, you will need to update your security settings for each device that you use to check and send emails https://www.telstra.com.au/support/email/unauthenticated-traffic-limit "

Unfortunetly this link does not give instructions for Thunderbird. Contacted Telstra support and they said to contact Thunderbird support.

Screen shot of current settings attached. Have been getting the following message when sending multiple emails - "Reference: 451-4.5.3. OB315 Unauthenticated traffic limit met."

Can someone help with this. Thanks in advance.
creator: eddielee67

title: Firma
content: Hola, queremos poner la firma automática para que aparezca en cada correo cuando respondemos, sólo aparece al final de toda la conversación. ¿Cómo podemos hacerlo? Es un archivo html con nuestro diseño personalizado. Gracias
